string.name: hiUser
string.comment: %s is the title+username e.g. 'GM ABC' or simply ABC if there is no title

string.name: awaitQuestion
string.comment: Displayed while waiting for results

resources.string: Que has estat fent aquest any?
Quin any d\'escacs que has tingut!
No has jugat cap partida aquest any.

string.name: gamesYouWon
string.comment: %s is the number of games won

string.name: gamesNextQuestion
string.comment:
Appears in the recap to set up some questions about the games you have played.
In context, it appears in this sequence:
"What a chess year you've had!" "You played %s games this year" "And you won %s of them!"
"What did it takes to get there?" <--- THIS MESSAGE
"ùë¶ {minutes/hours/days} spent playing" "{That is way too much chess./That is a lot of chess./That seems like a reasonable about of chess.}" "That's ùë•g of wood pushed"
There are more messages afterwards but it should give an idea of where it appears.

string.name: timeSpentPlayingExclam
string.comment: %s is the time spent playing animated from 0 e.g. '1 day, 17 hours'. The time is also translated

resources.string: Quants moviments has fet durat aquest temps?

string.name: movesOfWoodPushed
string.comment:
%s is a weight in grams or kilograms
This shows you the weight from all the moves you made in the year, if you were moving wooden pieces.

string.name: movesStandardPiecesWeight
string.comment: 40g as in 40 grams

resources.string: Les peces est√†ndard pesen normalment 40g cada una

string.name: chessFoes
string.comment: Best as in strongest opponents.

resources.string: Els teus millors rivals dels escacs

string.name: firstMoveStats
string.comment:
%s is the number of games played and their percentage of the total, in parentheses.
Subtitle to your most played move e.g. '1. e4'.
e.g. "1. e4 is how you started 50 (67%) of your games as white" Meaning you played 50 games as white over the past year, which was 67% of the games you played as white.

resources.string: √©s com has comen√ßat el %s de les teves partides amb blanques

string.name: openingsMostPlayedAsWhite
string.comment: %s is the number of games (translated)

resources.string: La teva obertura m√©s jugada amb blanques amb %s partides

string.name: openingsMostPlayedAsBlack
string.comment: %s is the number of games (translated)

resources.string: La teva obertura m√©s jugada amb negres amb %s partides

string.name: puzzlesHelpedTagging
string.comment: %s is a number e.g. 5

resources.string: Tamb√© has ajudat a etiquetar %s d\'ells.
No has resolt cap problema aquest any.
Has guanyat %s d\'ells a la primera!

string.name: sourcesPoolPairing
string.comment: Pool pairing in this context is the "Quick pairing" on the home page

string.name: sourcesTitle
string.comment: Find is about seeking, e.g. quick pairing or the lobby

resources.string: Quins controls de temps i variants has jugat?

string.name: lichessGamesPlayedIn
string.comment: %1$s is the number of games, %2$s is the year

string.name: lichessGamesOfThemYours
string.comment: %s is the percentage of games that are yours

string.name: thanksHaveAGreat
string.comment: %s is the next year

resources.string: Un plaer que hagis estat aqu√≠. Que tinguis un feli√ß %s!

string.name: shareableTitle
string.comment: %s is the current year

string.name: shareableSpentPlaying
string.comment: Subtitle to the translated time they have spent playing

string.name: shareableMostPlayedOpponent
string.comment: Subtitle to the username of the opponent you have played the most games against

string.name: shareableFavouriteVariant
string.comment: Subtitle to the variant you played the most games in

string.name: shareableFavouriteTimeControl
string.comment: Subtitle to the time control you played the most games in

string.name: recapReady
string.comment: %s is the year of the recap

resources.string: El teu resum del %s esta disponible!
